name: Maur's Maze
description:
So imagine yourself trapped in a huge dungeon of mazes which is home to a mighty creature named Maur and the souls of the people he killed in it. You have nothing to defend yourself against the creature. All you can do is RUN!

Maur's Mazes is a horror-puzzle kinda game with highly challenging tough mazes. Hope you enjoy the game :)

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/shahabassurvive

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Survival-Studios/454685358023445?fref=ts
